en-US.summary: Guess a number between 102 and 298, and Alexa will say Aces, Jumble and Zilch depending on how close you are.
examplePhrases: alexa open ay jay zee game
alexa ask aces jacks zilch game is it {number}
en-US.name: aces jacks zilch
en-US.description: Guess a number between 102 and 298, and Alexa will tell you if you if you got a single digit in the right place by saying ace, you got a digit in the wrong place by saying jumble or you got a digit wrong by saying zilch.

en-GB.summary: Guess a number between 102 and 298, and Alexa will say Aces, Jumble and Zilch depending on how close you are.
examplePhrases: Alexa open ay jay zee game
Alexa start aces jacks zilch game
Alexa ask aces jacks zilch game is it {number}
en-GB.name: aces jacks zilch
en-GB.description: Guess a number, and Alexa will tell you if you need to guess higher or lower. She will also tell you how many times you have played.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: The number if the number Alexa is thinking of is 245 and you guess 256 alexa will say AJZ.
